update unicom_group_wcdma
msc = #{msc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msc_pool = #{mscPool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oss = #{oss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pool = #{pool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signal_code = #{signalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lac = #{lac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rac = #{rac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a2ea_address = #{a2eaAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
swversion = #{swversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hwversion = #{hwversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room = #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scope = #{scope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARBINARY},
where group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT latitude,longitude FROM unicom_node_wcdma WHERE group_name = #{name};
SELECT level FROM unicom_quota_history_group_wcdma WHERE time =(SELECT MAX(time) FROM unicom_quota_history_group_wcdma) AND name = #{groupName}
